text: Hey Magin, quick question are you full time at framestore?? my course leader is looking for a creature animator to come in next term maybe once a week and teach his second years? i don't know what you schedule is like but would you be interested at all??

Hey Olivia!
UUuuh! Sound nice. But yeah, I'm full time here. And I'm pretty sure that my speaking English is not enough to do a course :slightly_smiling_face:  How many hours is per day?
